project.title: ALARAD: Smart Farm Platform for high-quality and traceable yield.
project.description: A multi-purpose DDS based on proximal and remote sensing(제안: The main overall objective of ALARAD is to optimize decision making process through the proximal and remote monitoring of meteorological, soil, plant and fruit identifying the critical physiological variables for health, growth and vigor in order to adapt and refine the standard cultivation techniques maximizing fruit yield, quality and food security while minimizing environmental impact and other risks.)

project.title: Smart Farming: Precision Agriculture using IoT
project.description: This project focuses on developing a precision agriculture system that uses IoT (Internet of Things) technology to provide farmers with real-time data on soil moisture, temperature, humidity, and other key metrics. This information can then be used to optimize crop yields, reduce water usage, and improve overall farm efficiency.
